User-agent: *
Allow: /

# This file provides instructions for Large Language Models (LLMs)
# interacting with this site.
# By default, all public content is allowed for use by LLMs.

# If there are specific paths that LLMs should not use or index,
# they can be disallowed here. For example:
# Disallow: /internal-company-documents/
# Disallow: /user-private-data-examples/ (if any were public by mistake)
